_header: Also Christ sty up hastily in on stonde so far to go
_description: On the ‘Leaps’ which Christ took between the Planets and Heavens — twenty long lines, most in couplets

CamCCC294.First Lines:
Also crist setȝ vp hastely In on stounde so fer to goAs dauid
                    in his prophecy told be fore hit schuld be so…
CamCCC294.Last Lines:
…Vus haue I acounted here howe crist lepte þorow his
                    mercyto xii þousand hit wyl a mount ȝif þay truly
                    metunben
CamCCC294.Editions:
Person,  Henry Axel. 
             Cambridge Middle English Lyrics.
         Seattle: University of Washington Press, 1953; rev. ed. 1962: 29.
CamCCC294.folio: loose leaf bound in after f. 129
